mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner=#{owner}, name=#{name}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, cost=#{cost}, description=#{description}, editTime=#{editTime}, editBy=#{editBy} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select u.name owner, a.id id, a.name name, a.startDate startDate, a.endDate endDate, a.cost cost, a.description description, a.createTime createTime, a.createBy createBy, a.editTime editTime, a.editBy editBy from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.id=#{id}
